name: Music_5153.wav
keywords: ['sitar', 'tabla', 'sitar licks', 'sitar arpeggio playing', 'tabla', 'vintage recording', 'traditional south asian music', 'indian music', 'simple tabla rhythm']
caption: In this recording we hear two main instruments - the sitar and the tabla. The sitar player plays some simple and slow licks, in an emotive way. The tabla player plays a simple rhythm to support the sitar. The recording is an old recording - and this is a vintage south asian music piece.
